@heroisgay wrote:

[quote=“Noob.Coder, post:4, topic:240440”]Not trying to be rude or anything, but wasn’t what trytohaxme2 typed the same thing as the error that occured with your disconnect = true;?
-Best of luck,
Noob.Coder[/quote]

No it wasnt, you have to be careful because the simplest things can cause errors. he changed disconnect = true;, with disconnected = true;. Or in other words he changed disconnect into disconnected

item.title: Npc Member Giver Error
item.dc:creator: @shortysean6 shortysean6
item.description:
@shortysean6 wrote:

[s]ive just added a whole new member system into my server and because i dont have any staff yet and i can stay up all night typing ::makemem or w/e ive decided that players can buy it for 50M…i added the code but it got an error…

client.java:19720: cannot find symbol symbol : variable disconnect location: class client disconnect = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

i dunno how to fix it and here is my npc member giver code

} else if (NPCID == 465) { //the mem maker npc id if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 50000000)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 50000000); playerIsMember = 1; disconnect = true; } else { sendMessage("You dont have enough money to become a member!"); }

i would appreciate the help thanks[/s]

Read full topic
